Game.Model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Game.Model.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    This holds the player data and the runtime data collected for player It holds the countries he conquered and it can be updated anytime. It also holds list of continents the he has conquered.
    Version:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    ndkcha, Jay, r-naik
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
